SEARCH
Package main.models

Class Application

java.lang.Object
main.models.Application
public class Application extends Object
Represents an application for a flat by an applicant. Tracks the flat type, associated project, and application status.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Application(Applicant applicant, String projectName, String flatType)
    Constructs a new Application with default \"Pending\" status.
    Application(Applicant applicant, String projectName, String flatType, String status, String prevStatus)
    Constructs a full Application instance.

    • Application

      public Application(Applicant applicant, String projectName, String flatType, String status, String prevStatus)
      Constructs a full Application instance.
      Parameters:
      applicant - the applicant
      projectName - the project applied for
      flatType - flat type applied (2-room, 3-room)
      status - current application status
      prevStatus - previous status (if withdrawing)

      projectName - project name
      flatType - flat type

      public String getStatus()
      Returns the current status of this application.
      Returns:
      current status (e.g., "PENDING", "APPROVED" or "REJECTED")

    • getPrevStatus

      public String getPrevStatus()
      Returns the previous status before the current update.
      Returns:
      previous status, or null if none
